description:
Nationally recognized as among the top personal injury lawyers in South Florida as well as the entire country, our attorneys at Frankl Kominsky Injury Lawyers in Pompano Beach are fully prepared to do whatever they can to increase your chances of obtaining the favorable outcomes you expect and deserve for the serious injuries you have suffered as the result of someone else's negligent, careless or unlawful actions.

Based in Boynton Beach, Florida, our law firm has grown to include our Pompano Beach location as well as one in Port St. Lucie, making us one of our region's most prominent personal injury practices. This success is the direct result of our unwavering commitment to our clients, and you can count on us to fight aggressively to help you recover the maximum amount of compensation possible.

To date, we have secured tens of millions of dollars in settlements and verdicts for our plaintiff clients, and our lawyers have earned memberships in the Million Dollar Advocates Forum and Multi-Million Dollar Advocates Forum as the result of their success. In addition, our attorneys have also earned consistent top rankings and endorsements from our peers, including designations on The National Trial Lawyers: Top 40 Under 40 list.

Perhaps more importantly, we have also received "Superb" ratings on Avvo, and our law firm has enjoyed numerous testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients, who praise us for the personalized counsel and aggressive advocacy we have provided to increase their chances for successful outcomes.

To find out more about how we can best serve your needs here at Frankl Kominsky Injury Lawyers, you can contact our law office or visit our website to schedule a free evaluation of your claim. We also currently offer virtual consultations so that you do not have to further risk your health and safety to speak with us.
